verses.verse: וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U set forward בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּעַֽרְב֣וֹת <S%H6160><s%> be-'ar-Vot in the plains מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, of Moab מֵעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> me-'E-ver on this side לְיַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> le-yar-Den Jordan יְרֵחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> ye-re-Cho. [by] Jericho ס sa-Mek

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw בָּלָ֖ק <S%H1111><s%> ba-Lak And Balak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צִפּ֑וֹר <S%H6834><s%> tzip-Por; of Zippor אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah had done יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El all that Israel לָֽאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <S%H567><s%> La-'e-mo-Ri. to the Amorites

וַיָּ֨גָר <S%H1481><s%> vai-Ya-gor afraid מוֹאָ֜ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av And Moab מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei of הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od was sore כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- because they [were] many ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu; he וַיָּ֣קָץ <S%H6973><s%> vai-Ya-kotz was distressed מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, and Moab מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei because of בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מוֹאָ֜ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av And Moab אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei unto the elders מִדְיָ֗ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan, of Midian עַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah Now יְלַחֲכ֤וּ <S%H3897><s%> ye-la-cha-Chu lick up הַקָּהָל֙ <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal Now shall this company אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all סְבִ֣יבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5439><s%> se-Vi-vo-Tei-nu, all [that are] round about כִּלְחֹ֣ךְ <S%H3897><s%> kil-Choch licketh up הַשּׁ֔וֹר <S%H7794><s%> hash-Shor, us as the ox אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et יֶ֣רֶק <S%H3418><s%> Ye-rek the grass הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh; of the field וּבָלָ֧ק <S%H1111><s%> u-va-Lak And Balak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צִפּ֛וֹר <S%H6834><s%> tzip-Por of Zippor מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech [was] king לְמוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> le-mo-'Av of the Moabites בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et at that time הַהִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv. he

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach He sent מַלְאָכִ֜ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בִּלְעָ֣ם <S%H1109><s%> bil-'Am therefore unto Balaam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בְּע֗וֹר <S%H1160><s%> be-'or, of Beor פְּ֠תוֹרָה <S%H6604><s%> Pe-to-rah to Pethor אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is near הַנָּהָ֛ר <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har which [is] by the river אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz of the land בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo of his people לִקְרֹא־ <S%H7121><s%> lik-ro- to call ל֑וֹ lo; לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, him saying הִ֠נֵּה <S%H2009><s%> Hin-neh Behold עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am Behold there is a people יָצָ֤א <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza come out מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim from Egypt הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold כִסָּה֙ <S%H3680><s%> chis-Sah behold they cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> 'ein the face הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the earth וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu and they יֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev and they abide מִמֻּלִֽי׃ <S%H4136><s%> mi-mu-Li. over against

וְעַתָּה֩ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now לְכָה־ <S%H1980><s%> le-chah- come נָּ֨א <S%H4994><s%> na please אָֽרָה־ <S%H779><s%> 'a-rah- now therefore I pray thee curse לִּ֜י li אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am me this people הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- since עָצ֥וּם <S%H6099><s%> 'a-Tzum for they [are] too mighty הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu they מִמֶּ֔נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni, are too אוּלַ֤י <S%H194><s%> 'u-Lai perhaps אוּכַל֙ <S%H3201><s%> 'u-Chal for me peradventure I shall prevail נַכֶּה־ <S%H5221><s%> nak-keh- [that] we may smite בּ֔וֹ bo, וַאֲגָרְשֶׁ֖נּוּ <S%H1644><s%> va-'a-ga-re-Shen-nu them and [that] I may drive them out מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- are too הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the land כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki since יָדַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti, for I wot אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom תְּבָרֵךְ֙ <S%H1288><s%> te-va-reCh that he whom thou blessest מְבֹרָ֔ךְ <S%H1288><s%> me-vo-Rach, [is] blessed וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher whom תָּאֹ֖ר <S%H779><s%> ta-'Or and he whom thou cursest יוּאָֽר׃ <S%H779><s%> yu-'Ar. is cursed

וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-le-Chu departed זִקְנֵ֤י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei And the elders מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av of Moab וְזִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> ve-zik-Nei and the elders מִדְיָ֔ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan, of Midian וּקְסָמִ֖ים <S%H7081><s%> u-ke-sa-Mim with the rewards of divination בְּיָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dam; in their hand וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> bil-'Am, unto Balaam וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-be-Ru and spake אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei unto him the words בָלָֽק׃ <S%H1111><s%> va-Lak. of Balak

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to לִ֤ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> Li-nu unto them Lodge פֹה֙ <S%H6311><s%> foh here הַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> hal-Lay-lah, here this night וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֤י <S%H7725><s%> va-ha-shi-vo-Ti again אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var, you word כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after יְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber shall speak יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; about וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu abode שָׂרֵֽי־ <S%H8269><s%> sa-rei- unto me and the princes מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av of Moab עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with בִּלְעָֽם׃ <S%H1109><s%> bil-'Am. with Balaam

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בִּלְעָ֑ם <S%H1109><s%> bil-'Am; unto Balaam וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said מִ֛י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H582><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim What men הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh are these עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach. with

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said בִּלְעָ֖ם <S%H1109><s%> bil-'Am And Balaam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; unto God בָּלָ֧ק <S%H1111><s%> ba-Lak Balak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צִפֹּ֛ר <S%H6834><s%> tzip-Por of Zippor מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av of Moab שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach hath sent אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai. about

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am Behold [there is] a people הַיֹּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> hai-yo-Tze come out מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt וַיְכַ֖ס <S%H3680><s%> vay-Chas which covereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> 'ein the face הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the earth עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah, now לְכָ֤ה <S%H1980><s%> le-Chah come קָֽבָה־ <S%H6895><s%> ka-vah- now curse לִּי֙ li אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, אוּלַ֥י <S%H194><s%> 'u-Lai perhaps אוּכַ֛ל <S%H3201><s%> 'u-Chal me them peradventure I shall be able לְהִלָּ֥חֶם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-La-chem to overcome בּ֖וֹ bo וְגֵרַשְׁתִּֽיו׃ <S%H1644><s%> ve-ge-rash-Tiv. them and drive them out

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> bil-'Am, unto Balaam לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> te-Lech go עִמָּהֶ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im-ma-Hem; with לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תָאֹר֙ <S%H779><s%> ta-'Or with them thou shalt not curse אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, the people כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בָר֖וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> va-Ruch for they [are] blessed הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

וַיָּ֤קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom rose up בִּלְעָם֙ <S%H1109><s%> bil-'Am And Balaam בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker, in the morning וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei unto the princes בָלָ֔ק <S%H1111><s%> va-Lak, of Balak לְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu to go אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַרְצְכֶ֑ם <S%H776><s%> 'ar-tze-Chem; you into your land כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מֵאֵ֣ן <S%H3985><s%> me-'En refuseth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, for the LORD לְתִתִּ֖י <S%H5414><s%> le-tit-Ti to give me leave לַהֲלֹ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> la-ha-Loch back עִמָּכֶֽם׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-ma-Chem. with

וַיָּק֙וּמוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> vai-ya-Ku-mu rose up שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei And the princes מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, of Moab וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and they went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בָּלָ֑ק <S%H1111><s%> ba-Lak; unto Balak וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and said מֵאֵ֥ן <S%H3985><s%> me-'En refuseth בִּלְעָ֖ם <S%H1109><s%> bil-'Am Balaam הֲלֹ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Loch to come עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu. yet

וַיֹּ֥סֶף <S%H3254><s%> vai-Yo-sef yet again ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od Then בָּלָ֑ק <S%H1111><s%> ba-Lak; And Balak שְׁלֹ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> she-Lo-ach sent שָׂרִ֔ים <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rim, princes רַבִּ֥ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim more וְנִכְבָּדִ֖ים <S%H3513><s%> ve-nich-ba-Dim and more honourable מֵאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> me-'El-leh. the former

וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u And they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בִּלְעָ֑ם <S%H1109><s%> bil-'Am; to Balaam וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-ru and said ל֗וֹ lo, כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar to him Thus saith בָּלָ֣ק <S%H1111><s%> ba-Lak Balak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צִפּ֔וֹר <S%H6834><s%> tzip-Por, of Zippor אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nothing נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na beg תִמָּנַ֖ע <S%H4513><s%> tim-ma-Na' Let nothing I pray thee hinder מֵהֲלֹ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> me-ha-Loch thee from coming אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai. about
